label: Big Bang
description: Origin of the universe from an initial singularity

label: Milky Way Galaxy Formation
description: Our galaxy began forming from primordial gas clouds

label: Earth Formation
description: Earth formed from the solar nebula through accretion

label: First Life on Earth
description: Earliest evidence of microbial life in the fossil record

label: Great Oxidation Event
description: Cyanobacteria began producing oxygen, dramatically changing Earth's atmosphere

label: Cambrian Explosion
description: Rapid diversification of animal life (~538-485 Ma) with the appearance of most major phyla

label: Permian-Triassic Extinction
description: The Great Dying: largest mass extinction, eliminating ~96% of marine species

label: Age of Dinosaurs
description: Dinosaurs dominated terrestrial ecosystems during the Mesozoic Era

label: Cretaceous-Paleogene Extinction
description: Asteroid impact ended the reign of non-avian dinosaurs

label: Emergence of Homo sapiens
description: Anatomically modern humans appeared in Africa
